column5: I've never fished it yet, but want to put in a 16' kayak next weekend. I'd like to target bass for sure any other species would be a bonus.  Just some basic direction of where to head to on the lake is all.  I'll be in Port Perry for the weekend , 2 blocks off the lake at the in-laws.  Thanks.
the docks right in port perry, there is parking right there and since its a yak, you wont have to wait for the launch.  Cheers!
watch the weeds!  From bottom to top the lake is thick thick thick with them.
Definately NOT on the south side of the causeway...entire area is posted as private property...as mentioned...the park in Port Perry
